channel.title: Auto start a wave play fn stereo?
channel.description: Hi there just trying to play a file from the sdcard when the board is connected. Is there a way to do that. Now im using a lfo but its repeating the trigger. Id like to have a single trigger. Have no hardware just the naked board. Im using the nice wave play fn stereo object.

item.title: Auto start a wave play fn stereo?

item.description:
@shihweichieh wrote:

ha now you are trying with Axoloti too!

Read full topic
